summary: The Patriots Over Politics Act amends U.S. Code Title 38 to allow veterans separated from the Armed Forces between August 24, 2021, and January 10, 2023, due to refusal of a COVID-19 vaccination, to transfer their educational assistance benefits to their dependents. This applies to those involuntarily or voluntarily separated. The child using the transferred entitlement can begin using it after the transferring individual has completed six years of service.
